summary: FRONT BRAKES SEIZED UP WHEN DRIVING DOWN ROAD JUST AS WARRANTY WAS TO EXPIRE.  CONTACTED DEALER AFTER THIS HAD HAPPENED 4-5 TIMES.  DEALER REPLACED FRONT CALIPERS BUT WAS OUT OF WARRANTY.  4 MONTHS LATER HAD TO REPLACE BOTH REAR CALIPERS FOR SEIZURE PROBLEM.  FORD DEALER WOULD NOT PROVIDE ANY COMPENSATION.  NOW 2 MONTHS LATER, CHECK BRAKE LIGHT IS ON. *TR
